item.description:
An-Ra is a beautiful, gentle and loving system of healing

that was brought to the directors of Pathways through their

own personal experiences as well as the information

channeled from their guides. The healers learn to draw

upon the unconditional love of mother earth with the

Divine Compassion, Understanding, Wisdom and Forgiveness of Source,

and to direct this energy from their hearts into the person receiving the healing.

During this evening of healing the participants will

learn how they can co create their own healing, there will be an energy circle,

powerful guided meditation and individual An-Ra Energy work

by the certified An-Ra Healers. Donations accepted.

Note: This is the 19th year that Dr. Bezmen has been doing these monthly healings for the public.
item.how_to_find_us: Judith and William and the certified An-Ra Healers will meet you there.
item.name: An-Ra Energy Healing Night & Meditation
